short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Forwards all YouTube channel Home pages to their Videos page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Youtube Channel Forwarder is a tiny app that forwards all youtube links to a channel's Home page to their Videos page. I created this app for myself because I hate being directed to the youtube channel Home page which usually includes an autoplaying video that I don't want to see.
